title: Top Floor 2BR 2BA Westwood Penhouse w/ Balcony, Parking
posting_body: Top Floor 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Penthouse Apartment Home.
Please do not visit property without our leasing agent.
2 bedroom apartment offers the following features:

Beautifully designed top floor 2 bedroom 2 bath penthouse apartment floor plan offers residents the perfect blend of modern architectural design, high-end appointments and charming interiors that will impress those with even the most refined tastes, apartment features include private balcony, central air/heat, cozy fireplace, extra storage space, and wood/carpet flooring.
Apartment is thoughtfully detailed with lavish amenities including covered parking, an elevator, a garage, a fitness center, a laundry facility, and a swimming pool.
Experience an exceptional level of service, posh interior appointments, and extraordinary amenities at Midvale Court.
Kitchen is fully equipped with appliances including a microwave, a dishwasher, a gas stove/oven and a refrigerator.
Minutes away to all popular Westside destinations including Armand Hammer Museum of Art & Cultural Center, UCLA, Getty Museum, Geffen Playhouse, Wadsworth Theatre.
Fabulous restaurants and shopping, movie theatres, world class yoga, and public transportation are all at your fingertips.
For appointment or for questions, call us today at
